short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily see real photos from the users reviews

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of guessing how is the real product behind the fake DHGate photo? This small extension extracts the images from the reviews (photos from real users) and makes them available through two shortcuts
1) In the color selection menu, all the variations from which we found real photos will display a small red dot in the right-bottom corner. You can click that dot to quickly see the photos.
2) Also, when you select a color option and the extension finds photos of that product variation, a button "Show Real Photos" will appear.
